---
title: "02_clean"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

load the raw data

```{r}
saa_data_raw <- read_tsv("../data/01_dat_load.tsv")
```

clean it

```{r}
saa_data_tidy <- saa_data_raw |>
  select(-"COHORT",
         -"PI_NAME",
         -"PI_INSTITUTION",
         -"TYPE",
         -"SAAMethod",
         -"SAA_Type",
         -starts_with("TSmax"),
         -starts_with("SLOPE"),
         -starts_with("T50"),
         -starts_with("Sample"))
```

save the cleaned data

```{r}
write_tsv(saa_data_tidy, "../data/02_dat_clean.tsv")
```
